data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Re Submission Of Corporate Announcement
data.news_body: This is in reference to the mail received from BSE dated 14.08.2023 regarding additional details required for corporate announcement filed under regulation 30 of SEBI LODR REGULATIONS, 2015. The Board Meeting of OMDC was held on 12.08.2023 to consider and approve the unaudited financial results for quarter 1 of FY 2024.The Board Meeting commenced on 15.00 P.M and ended on 18.40 P.M.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Revised Outcome-UNAUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER ENDED 30TH SEPTEMBER, 2022
data.news_body:
As per Mail dated on 22.11.2022 (email from: query.lodr@bseindia.com) regarding not submitted Limited review report from the auditors for the quarter ended 30.09.2022.

We have reuplorded as per advice received.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for UNAUDITED FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER ENDED 30TH SEPTEMBER, 2022
data.news_body:
Sir/Madam,
Please find enclosed herewith the unaudited Financial Results of The Orissa Minerals Development Company Limited for the quarter ended 30th September, 2022.
This is for your kind information and record as per Regulation 33 of SEBI (LODR) Regulations, 2015.

data.caption: We Received A Mail Dated 22Nd July To Submit Declaration Or Statement Of Impact Of Audit Qualifications Which We Are Submitting Here.
data.news_body: Submission of declaration under regulation 33(3)(d) of the SEBI(LODR) Regulations, 2015.We hereby confirm that our auditor has given unmodified opinion with respect to annual audited financial results for the quarter and year ended 31st march,2022.
